casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Malik Jaquez WALTON. No. 439P14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 10, 2015. Mark Montgomery, Durham, for Walton, Malik Jaquez. William V. Conley, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of December 2014 by Defendant to Deem Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review Timely Filed:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of June 2015."
